newsitem.title: FRANCE: French govt ends Thomson-CSF selloff process.
newsitem.headline: French govt ends Thomson-CSF selloff process.

text.p: The French government said on Friday it had decided to halt the privatisation of Thomson-CSF and would propose an alternative solution to build "a French professional and defence electronics pillar" based on the company.
Prime Minister Lionel Jospin's office said in a statement that the state would retain a stake that gave it ultimate decision making power.
